name: Creamy Swiss and Broccoli Soup
author: Zachary Estes
instructions: Boil ham in water for 10 minutes; add broccoli. Cook until ten- der. Gradually add milk to flour, stirring until well blended. Gradually add milk mixture to ham mixture, stirring constantly until mixture slightly thickens. Simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add cheese and seasonings. Cook until cheese begins to melt.
